name: Craif
difference: Requires urine sample. We need no sample at all.

name: Galleri (GRAIL)
difference: Needs 50-100M cells. Only 17% Stage I sensitivity. We detect at 5-10M cells.

name: Michigan State SERS
difference: Requires nanoparticles applied to tissue. Not non-invasive.

name: SpotitEarly
difference: Not scalable. We're a device, not a dog.

name: DermaSensor
description: Handheld skin lesion scanner, FDA cleared
difference: Detects visible lesions only. We detect pre-lesion. Different stage entirely.

name: Surfix Diagnostics
difference: Still blood-based. Photonics but requires sample.
